藊字的基本解释

藊
biǎn
〔藊豆〕同“扁豆”，荚果扁平，微弯，种子白色或紫黑色，可作蔬菜，亦可入药。

藊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biǎn］
［《集韻》補典切，上銑，幫。］
见“藊豆”。

藊字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藊； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1064第04
【集韻】補典切，音匾。豆名。【本草】李時珍曰：藊本作扁，莢形扁也。

藊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
藊字的起名意思

暂无。

藊
Basic explanation of words
藊
biǎn
〔Lotus〕 is the same as "lentils". The pods are flat, slightly curved, and the seeds are white or purple-black. They can be used as vegetables and medicine.
藊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biǎn］
["Jiyun" supplementary cut, milling, help. ]
See "藊豆".
藊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Words] 　藊; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1064 04
[Ji Yun] Supplementary code cut, sound plaque. Bean name. [Materia Medica] Li Shizhen said: The root of 藊 is flat, and the shape of a pod is flat.
